title: Wrecking Ball (Miley Cyrus)
lyrics: We clawed, we chained our hearts in vain We jumped, never asking why We kissed, I fell under your spell A love no one could deny Don’t you ever say I just walked away I will always want you I can’t live a lie, running for my life I will always want you I came in like a wrecking ball I never hit so hard in love All I wanted was to break your walls All you ever did was wreck me Yeah, you wreck me I never meant to start a war I just wanted you to let me in And instead of using force I guess I should’ve let you in I never meant to start a war I just wanted you to let me in I guess I should’ve let you in Don’t you ever say I just walked away I will always want you
